ESBMessagePipelineStorage.Name: RouteByAction
ESBMessagePipelineStorage.PipelineBlob: StepNotAddedfalseStepNotAddedRouteByActionProcessFragmentDisablefalse34c4ad26-387b-4908-a621-711e16cb57d8Routing Logic<_x003C_TurnOffAddSegmentExecution_x003E_k__BackingField>false// Set the topic with the subtopic that represents (maps) the service endpoint (service connector) to route to based on the value // of the soap action. If the proccess does NOT end with a Cancel process step, the message will be published // to the bus and forwarded to the subscribing service endpoints. if (context.Data.Header.Action == "V1") context.Data.Header.Topic = "NorthStar.HR.V1";
